棐字的基本解释

棐
fěi
辅助：“孰神不棐兮，陨子于溪。”
古通“菲”，菲薄。
古通“榧”，香榧，常绿乔木。
古通“篚”，盛东西的椭圆形竹器。

棐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fěi］
［《廣韻》府尾切，上尾，非。］
(1)辅导，辅助。
(2)同“非”。不。参见“棐德”。
(3)通“篚”。盛物的椭圆形竹器。
(4)通“榧”。木名。即香榧。其木可制几桌，因亦代称几桌。
(5)通“扉”。门扉。
(6)古地名。

棐字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　棐； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页532第08
【唐韻】【韻會】府尾切【集韻】?尾切【正韻】敷尾切，?音菲。【說文】輔也。【徐曰】輔卽弓檠也，故从木。【書·大誥】天棐忱辭。【洛誥】聽朕敎汝于棐民彝。　又與榧同。木名。可爲几。【晉書·王羲之傳】見門生棐几滑淨作書。　又與篚同。【前漢·食貨志】歲入貢棐。【應劭云】方曰箱，橢曰棐。　又地名。【左傳·文十三年】鄭伯會公于棐。

考證：〔【洛誥】朕敎汝以棐民彝。〕　謹照原文改聽朕敎汝于棐民彝。

字源演变：

棐字的起名意思

辅助，辅导；又通"榧"、"篚"。

Deceive
Basic explanation of words
Deceive
fěi
Support: "Which god does not hold on to Xi, the fallen son Yuxi."
Gu Tong "Philip", insignificant.
Gutong "Truya", torreya, evergreen trees.
Gutong "bamboo", oval bamboo ware for holding things.
Deceive
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fěi］
["Guangyun" Fu tail cut, upper tail, non. ]
(1) Counseling, assistance.
(2) Same as "not". Do not. See "Lie De".
(3) Through "Zhu". Oval-shaped bamboo wares.
(4) Through "Turaya". Wooden name. Namely torreya. The wood can make several tables, because it is also called a few tables.
(5) Through "Fei". Door door.
(6) Ancient place names.
Deceive
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　棐; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 532 08
[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Fu Tail Cut [Ji Yun]? Tail Cut [Zheng Rhyme] Apply Tail Cut,? Yin Fei. [Said the text] Supplementary. [Xu Yue] The auxiliary bow is also from the wood. [Book·DaGao] Tiandi's heartfelt speech. 【Luogao】Listen to me, Yu Yu Dimin Yi.　Same as 榧 again. Wooden name. It can be a few. [Book of Jin·The Biography of Wang Xi] See the disciple to write a book.　Same as Zhuo again. [Previous Han·Food and Merchandise History] A tribute every year. [Ying Shaoyun] The square is called the box, and the oval is called the 棐.　Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan·Wen Thirteenth Year] Zheng Bohui was publicly known to Di. Textual research: [[Luo Gao] I call you to the people. 〕 　 I would like to change the original text to listen to me.

Name meaning
Auxiliary, tutoring; also through "Chinese torre" and "Zhu".
fěi
I гл.
* помогать, оказывать помощь
棐忱 помогать от всей души (со всей искренностью)
II сущ.
1) вм. 匪, 篚 (плетёный сундук, бамбуковая корчина)
2) бот. вм. 榧 (торрея)
III отрицание
* вм. 非 (не, напр. 棐常 необычайный)
